comment.body:
related to #145593

`@@||asus.com/popup.js` works well for the demo UI, but not for my router because the rule is too specific.
For example my router is accessible on Asus DDNS https://my-username.asuscomm.com but also on my own domain https://my-domain.com, both triggering the filter.

I suggest `@@||asuscomm.com/popup.js` for the DDNS. But for the custom domains I don't see an obvious workaround despite completely removing this rule

issue.title: Как с помощью фильтра изменить значение атрибута у html-тега ?
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [ ] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [ ] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11/54

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://example.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Peter Lowe's Blocklist

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Annoyances, I don't care about cookies

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Как с помощью фильтра изменить значение атрибута у html-тега ?

Как в данном случае заменить 123 на 456 ?

```

<html abc="123" >

```

Вариант с простой replace - заменой текста отпадает. Страница рендерится "на лету".

p.s. Что промаркировать в опциях тикета стелс-режима при "высоком" уровне антитрекинга ?

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07DHZRW4Q?th=1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB07DHZRW4Q%3Fth%3D1) ### Comment > Note that I left all settings options in the bug report form as is, b/c the AdGuard add-on is disabled for the web site (but enabled on the Add-Ons page). Also, it used to auto-populate the current settings in the form, but it didn’t do it this time. > > For several months, the Allowlist in the Firefox add-on has not been working properly on Amazon. When it’s disabled in the toolbar icon (and in the Allowlist), the Legitimate URL Shortener and AdGuard URL Tracking filter (if enabled) in the “Privacy” section still both block all sponsored product links that contain '$' and '&' special characters in the URL. This doesn’t happen in AdGuard for Safari, b/c these filters are not included in this version. > > https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07DHZRW4Q – Click on any of the sponsored links in the “Products related to this item” section below the product, and they all return the error “Sorry, we couldn’t find that page”. When I disable these 2 filters, they all load fine. > > Also, why doesn’t AdGuard for Safari also include these filters, or have an essential Tracking Protection section like the Firefox add-on does? > > Additionally, on the “Share your settings” page when reporting an issue, it should include an option for “None” (no filters enabled), rather than requiring you to remove all filters from the list. > > Thanks Username: `@shape55` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/cwgxprnd5n48csg0ssos08wgg8k80k8km8nq62dveo.png?nc=1)

pull_request.title: Fix #197308 woltair.pl
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

[#197308](https://www.github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/197308)

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

Choose only "Functional" cookie

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1: Cookie selection page</summary>

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/be98d639-d426-4086-9e9b-9e35ffc8c98c)

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
If the website has low traffic, we do not add rules. Note that we have some exceptions to this:
- adservers, trackers can be added
- if there is a rule in the filters that we use and it works fine, the domain can be added there. It is our choice whether to do it or not.

So, I see that's okay. You can add that to the rule.

> Btw, the website has low traffic, so you shouldn't add any rules. However, we have a rule that can block it, so add the domain there.
> 
> ```

Ah I see. Thanks. Since I saw `topmarkety.pl` which has lower traffic than this site at some lines below, I thought cookie lists would accept low traffic sites too.

So should I add the domain to `! ##.fixed.bottom-0` or we can ignore it?

comment.body:
Ah yeah. Looks like only `woltair.pl#%#//scriptlet('set-cookie', 'CM_BANNER', 'false')` is enough to hide the banner. The above cookies appear when users turn off other cookie options in the cookie page.

Since the first one is enough to hide, I'll remove the other 3.

issue.title: Fix #197285 lewdgames.to
issue.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

[#197285](https://www.github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/197285)

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.title: www.ariva.de

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: By Design
labels.description: The issue cannot be resolved due to technical, ethic, or legal reasons

issue.body:
## Information

### Deutsch

Sehr geehrte Benutzerin, sehr geehrter Benutzer, aufgrund von Gesetzen ([z. B. die Gerichtsentscheidung in Karlsruhe, Deutschland im Jahre 2018](https://www.morgenpost.de/wirtschaft/article214069831/Karlsruhe-erlaubt-Werbeblocker.html)) ist es leider nicht möglich diese Paywall (Adblock-Erkennung) zu umgehen. Vielen Dank für Ihr Verständnis.

### English

Dear user, due to a court decision ([eg the court ruling in Karlsruhe, Germany in 2018](https://www.morgenpost.de/wirtschaft/article214069831/Karlsruhe-erlaubt-Werbeblocker.html) ) it is unfortunately not possible to bypass this paywall (adblock detection). Thank you for your understanding.

comment.body: Yes, I received the code via email, I put it in the input, and the authorization went through. Please try disabling filters (and stealth mode functions) one by one. When you find which one is causing the issue, leave it alone. Then open the filter log and take a screenshot of all blocked requests. Screenshots can be attached in GitHub comment.

issue.title: Как с помощью фильтра изменить значение атрибута у html-тега ?
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [ ] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [ ] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11/54

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://example.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Peter Lowe's Blocklist

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Annoyances, I don't care about cookies

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Как с помощью фильтра изменить значение атрибута у html-тега ?

Как в данном случае заменить 123 на 456 ?

```

<html abc="123" >

```

Вариант с простой replace - заменой текста отпадает. Страница рендерится "на лету".

p.s. Что промаркировать в опциях тикета стелс-режима при "высоком" уровне антитрекинга ?

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
В фильтрах можно поискать по `trusted-set-attr`



> Скриплеты - это JS. А с JS у меня не очень.

Они более высокоуровневые. Знание JS не всегда необходимо.
